txt.en: Your mission is to defeat the wargs inside Shathur-munzu.\n\nSpeak to Hórin to travel to Shathur-munzu.

'I have a new mission for you, [placeholder].\n\n'Shathur-munzu, the abandoned fort in Duskenvale, had been quiet since the departure of the warg chieftain, but the scouts now report that they have seen wargs hunting in the forest nearby. We cannot allow the wargs to regain a foothold to the south! I need you to enter that foul den and clear them out!'
DNT - 'When you are ready, the scouts will lead you to Shathur-munzu. Good luck!'
'Well done! Though the great prize of Gundabad stands in front of us, we must remember to also protect our rear!'
The mission is complete!\n\nSpeak to Hórin for your reward!
The Orcs and wargs have returned to Shathur-munzu, attempting to set up a new base south of the warfront….\n\nYour mission is to defeat the wargs inside Shathur-munzu.
You have been tasked with dispatching the wargs inside Shathur-munzu.
Monsters in this mission will apply a corruption buff to nearby allies.
